blogPost.excerpt: GoCopy is an AI writing assistant. We augment your creative process with AI-powered writing tools. Say goodbye to writer's block and get your creative juices flowing.
blogPost.body: GoCopy is an AI writing assistant. We augment your creative process with AI-powered writing tools. Say goodbye to writer's block and get your creative juices flowing.
blogPost.title: GoCopy - Make writing easier with GPT-3
blogPost.author: Brent Rohner

localize.description: GoCopy是一款AI写作助手。我们用AI驱动的写作工具增强您的创作过程。告别写作障碍，让您的创作灵感源源不断。
GoCopy是一款AI寫作助手。我們用AI驅動的寫作工具增強您的創作過程。告別寫作障礙，讓您的創作靈感源源不斷。

previous.excerpt: Connect your SQL database to Clay to insert your query results directly in Google Sheets. Goodbye to hopping between SQL editors, CSV downloads, Excel, and Dashboards. Have your financial models, growth charts, and customer lists always up to date!
previous.title: ClaySQL - Run SQL queries directly in Google Sheets

localize.description: 将您的SQL数据库连接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查询结果。告别在SQL编辑器、CSV下载、Excel和Dashboards之间跳来跳去。让你的财务模型、增长图表和客户名单始终保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中运行SQL查询

localize.description: 將您的SQL數據庫連接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查詢結果。告別在SQL編輯器、CSV下載、Excel和Dashboards之間跳來跳去。讓你的財務模型、增長圖表和客戶名單始終保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中運行SQL查詢

next.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
next.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API

localize.description: Recipes是一种新的方式，可以在您的ReadMe文档中创建分步的代码演练。通过帮助您展示API的最佳用例，开发人员可以轻松上手，同时节省您的团队在开发人员支持上的时间。
localize.tagline: 为您的API提供逐步的代码演练。

localize.description: Recipes是一種新的方式，可以在您的ReadMe文檔中創建分步的代碼演練。通過幫助您展示API的最佳用例，開發人員可以輕鬆上手，同時節省您的團隊在開發人員支持上的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲您的API提供逐步的代碼演練。
